info.title: Documents Service
info.description: Upload files and convert them to AI-readable formats, create and manage vector stores, and perform hybrid search.

post.description:
Upload a file to reference later.
    
Rate limit: 30 requests per user per minute.
    
Max file size: 512MB.
    
Supported formats: .pdf, .docx, .pptx, .xlsx, .md, .csv, .html, .xhtml,
    .png, .jpeg, .tiff, .bmp, .adoc, .webp
    
You can add up to 16 pairs of custom metadata to the file. Metadata keys max length is 64 chars.
    Metadata values max length is 512 chars.

get.description:
Returns a list of files.
    
Rate limit: 120 requests per user per minute.

Returns a file.
    
Rate limit: 120 requests per user per minute.

put.description:
Modify a file's metadata.
    
Metadata keys max length is 64 chars. Metadata values max length is 512 chars.
    
Rate limit: 60 requests per user per minute.

delete.description:
Returns file deletion status.
    
Rate limit: 60 requests per user per minute.

post.description:
Create a vector store.
    
Rate limit: 30 requests per user per minute.
    
Vector store name must be between 1 and 63 characters long.
    
Vector store name can only contain letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores.

get.description:
Returns a list of vector stores.
    
Rate limit: 120 requests per user per minute.

Returns a vector store.
    
Rate limit: 120 requests per user per minute.

put.description:
Modify a vector store's name and metadata.
    
Metadata keys max length is 64 chars. Metadata values max length is 512 chars.
    
Rate limit: 60 requests per user per minute.

delete.description:
Returns vector store deletion status.
    
Rate limit: 60 requests per user per minute.

post.description:
Search a vector store for relevant content chunks based on a query and filters.
    
Rate limit: 30 requests per user per minute.
    
Query max length: 10000 characters.
    
Max results: 1-50 (defaults to 10).
    
Files: Optional. The file IDs to restrict the search to.

Add a file to a vector store.
    
Rate limit: 30 requests per user per minute.

get.description:
Returns a list of files from a vector store.
    
Rate limit: 120 requests per user per minute.

Returns a file from a vector store.
    
Rate limit: 120 requests per user per minute.

put.description:
Modify a vector store file's metadata.
    
Metadata keys max length is 64 chars. Metadata values max length is 512 chars.
    
Rate limit: 60 requests per user per minute.

delete.description:
Returns vector store file deletion status.
    
Rate limit: 60 requests per user per minute.

get.description:
Returns the markdown content of a vector store file.
    
Rate limit: 60 requests per user per minute.
